metadata.Title: CVE-2014-5313 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description:
Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in the management page in Six Apart Movable Type before 5.2 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via unspecified vectors.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-5313` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

movabletype-opensource - 5.2.9+dfsg-1
movabletype-plugin-core - 5.2.9+dfsg-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: movabletype-opensource package in trusty, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '5.2.9+dfsg-1').
